text: Ke Eena ea hlahisang lirapa tse methating le tse seng methating, lipalema, masimo a behang lijo tsa mefuta eohle, mehloare le likharenate tse ts’oanang le tse sa ts’oaneng. U je litholoana tsa lifate tseo nakong eo li behileng, u be u lefe nyehelo ka tsona nakong ea kotulo, empa u se be bohlasoa. Bona! Allah ha a rate ba bohlasoa
